title.bibl: Dziennik Chicagoski, Dec. 22, 1892. Kosciusko Monument Fund Receives Support

div.bibl: Dziennik Chicagoski, Dec. 22, 1892. KOSCIUSKO MONUMENT FUND RECEIVES SUPPORT

body.p: Through the efforts of M. Lisicki, $15.55 was collected for the Kosciusko Monument Fund at a christening party at the home of M. Wleklinski. J. Kromka of Detroit, president of the Polish Roman Catholic Union, and B. Straszynski of Milwaukee, secretary of the Polish Roman Catholic Union, contributed two and three dollars, respectively, for the monument while visiting Chicago recently.
